svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - December 30 2023
December 30 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
December 30, 2023" date: "2023-12-29"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
â€¢ No core devs call this week, next all core devs - execution (ACDE) call January 4
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.62% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.62% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus
layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Research
â€¢ Vitalikâ€™s Proof of Stake simplification proposal, 3 approaches to cap signatures to 8192 per slot: DVT : 4096 validators with minimum
4096 ETH deposit, solo stakers join DVT pools Two-tiered staking : heavy layer (4096 ETH min deposit) finalizes and light layer (no min
deposit) attests, heavy layer + 50% or more of online light layer to finalize a block Rotating participation : randomly choose 4096 active
validators, incentive weight decoupled from consensus weight
Vitalikâ€™s Proof of Stake simplification proposal, 3 approaches to cap signatures to 8192 per slot:
â€¢ DVT : 4096 validators with minimum 4096 ETH deposit, solo stakers join DVT pools
DVT : 4096 validators with minimum 4096 ETH deposit, solo stakers join DVT pools
â€¢ Two-tiered staking : heavy layer (4096 ETH min deposit) finalizes and light layer (no min deposit) attests, heavy layer + 50% or more of
online light layer to finalize a block
Two-tiered staking : heavy layer (4096 ETH min deposit) finalizes and light layer (no min deposit) attests, heavy layer + 50% or more of
â€¢ Rotating participation : randomly choose 4096 active validators, incentive weight decoupled from consensus weight
Rotating participation : randomly choose 4096 active validators, incentive weight decoupled from consensus weight
â€¢ Execution tickets (previously Attester-Proposer Separation): in-protocol ticket market, lottery to select beacon block proposer &
attesters and lottery to select execution block proposer & attesters
Execution tickets (previously Attester-Proposer Separation): in-protocol ticket market, lottery to select beacon block proposer &
â€¢ Blob DA scaling overview : up to 128 blobs via 1D PeerDAS, then increase up to 256 blobs via 2D PeerDAS or full Danksharding
Blob DA scaling overview : up to 128 blobs via 1D PeerDAS, then increase up to 256 blobs via 2D PeerDAS or full Danksharding
MEV
â€¢ MEV-Boost auction model and bidding strategies (naive, adaptive, last-minute & bluff bidding) show reducing latency optimizes builders
performance
MEV-Boost auction model and bidding strategies (naive, adaptive, last-minute & bluff bidding) show reducing latency optimizes builders
â€¢ Rekt: $1.3M paid to solo validator by searcher after user error adding liquidity
Rekt: $1.3M paid to solo validator by searcher after user error adding liquidity
Layer 2
â€¢ zkSync Era network issues post-mortem: safety procedure caused sequencer to wait for computed state update mismatch to be resolved
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs EIP7581 : Increase block gas target and gaslimit
EIPs
â€¢ EIP7581 : Increase block gas target and gaslimit
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7582 : Modular accounts with delegated validation (ERC4337 extension) ERC7583 : Inscription in smart
contract ERC7584 : Linagee Name Registrar and Ethereum Content Delivery Network ERC7585 : MixHash and public data storage proofs
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7582 : Modular accounts with delegated validation (ERC4337 extension)
ERC7582 : Modular accounts with delegated validation (ERC4337 extension)
â€¢ ERC7583 : Inscription in smart contract
ERC7583 : Inscription in smart contract
â€¢ ERC7584 : Linagee Name Registrar and Ethereum Content Delivery Network
ERC7584 : Linagee Name Registrar and Ethereum Content Delivery Network
â€¢ ERC7585 : MixHash and public data storage proofs
ERC7585 : MixHash and public data storage proofs
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Hardhat-chai-matchers v2.0.3 : adds Addressable support in withArgs & equals
Hardhat-chai-matchers v2.0.3 : adds Addressable support in withArgs & equals
â€¢ Solidity memory safety: avoid scratch space between assembly blocks
Solidity memory safety: avoid scratch space between assembly blocks
â€¢ xdeployer v3.0.0 (Hardhat plugin for deterministic address deployment): uses CreateX
xdeployer v3.0.0 (Hardhat plugin for deterministic address deployment): uses CreateX
â€¢ Halmos v0.1.10 (symbolic testing): reduces memory footprint, adds match-test & match-contract options and adds timeout & error failure
modes
Halmos v0.1.10 (symbolic testing): reduces memory footprint, adds match-test & match-contract options and adds timeout & error failure
â€¢ EVMole v0.3.1 (function selector extractor): adds Rust implementation
EVMole v0.3.1 (function selector extractor): adds Rust implementation
â€¢ Ethernaut CTF solutions in Foundry
Ethernaut CTF solutions in Foundry
â€¢ Sourcify updates: containerized components, run components with custom configs and removes create2 verification
Sourcify updates: containerized components, run components with custom configs and removes create2 verification
Security
â€¢ Trail of Bits: ABI zero-sized types (ZSTs) DoS attack on ABI parsers
Trail of Bits: ABI zero-sized types (ZSTs) DoS attack on ABI parsers
â€¢ Solidity contract with view function verified on Etherscan without view function declared
Solidity contract with view function verified on Etherscan without view function declared
Ecosystem
â€¢ Vitalik: make Ethereum cypherpunk again
Vitalik: make Ethereum cypherpunk again
â€¢ Etherscan: multichain portfolio and advanced filter time series chart
Etherscan: multichain portfolio and advanced filter time series chart
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 10.0 to 177.0 gwei, with 23.4 gwei average Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei 1k ETH net burn
this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 10.0 to 177.0 gwei, with 23.4 gwei average
â€¢ Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei
â€¢ 1k ETH net burn this week
1k ETH net burn this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,194 - $2,431, currently $2,279
ETHUSD : $2,194 - $2,431, currently $2,279
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.055 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.055 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Infinex (perp trading) live on Base, web2 style UX, self-custody accounts, waitlist
Infinex (perp trading) live on Base, web2 style UX, self-custody accounts, waitlist
â€¢ Aave governance v3 live, low cost voting on L2s & other chains, delegations reset
Aave governance v3 live, low cost voting on L2s & other chains, delegations reset
Job Listings
â€¢ ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ BarnBridge $1.7M settlement with SEC for selling SMART yield bonds
BarnBridge $1.7M settlement with SEC for selling SMART yield bonds
â€¢ India block 9 overseas centralized exchanges & issue show cause notices
India block 9 overseas centralized exchanges & issue show cause notices
General
â€¢ Redditors report Mt Gox fiat repayments to PayPal accounts
Redditors report Mt Gox fiat repayments to PayPal accounts
â€¢ Thunder 87k ETH exploit , wallet withdrawals via session tokens from MongoDB connection URL
Thunder 87k ETH exploit , wallet withdrawals via session tokens from MongoDB connection URL
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and @evan_van_ness to get most of the weekâ€™s news in
real time.
